Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1981...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1988, off Danny Darwin (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1988, off Bill Dawley (CAL)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1988, hitting .281 with 15 HR, 77 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1989, hitting .476 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 7 RBI against New York (A) on 6/20/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1990, hitting .545 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1990, hitting .418 with 9 HR, 38 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1990, hitting .550 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1990, hitting .394 with 7 HR, 20 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 6/14/1991...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 8/2/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1992, hitting .455 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1994, hitting .340 with 9 HR, 30 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1994, hitting .435 with 5 HR, 29 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 6/9/1994...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1995, hitting .600 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
